name: Esploratore
description:
Esploratore is a small 3D action game, in single player, with low poly
graphic, where you can explore a small map, do some quest, fight enemies, and use the money that you get, to buy yourself stuff from the shopkeepers in the village.

You are walking down the street, when an old man lose his bag. You decide to run after him to return him the bag, and then something happened.

Game duration, about 1 hour

Made with Unity

Supported input devices:
Mouse and keyboard
Xbox controller

To run on GNU/Linux:
Select the application and right click -> Properties -> Permissions -> Check: Allow executing file as program.

ALSO BE SURE YOU HAVE INSTALLED THE LATEST VERSION OF THE GRAPHIC DRIVERS. For better performance.

Made by: Stefano Terranova
